root_cause: Regression in numeric conversion logic in Redis 7.2 where `fpconv_dtoa` fails to correctly convert specific numeric values (multiples of 100,000,000) when converting from Lua number to string representation
title: [BUG] hIncrBy from lua "ERR value is not an integer or out of range" with numeric values of the form n * 100,000,000 in redis 7.2, but not 6.2 or 7.0
